Instagram.inputEmail: Numri, emri i përdoruesit ose emaili
Instagram.forgetPassText1: Më fal, fjalëkalimi yt ishte i pasaktë.

Thanks.sectH1: Thanks for Voting for your friends and Family
Thanks.sectP1: You can also vote again with another instagram profile, their is no limit in voting but note that you can't use one instagram to vote twice
Thanks.sectH2: Welcome to the Ambassador Voting Platform!
Thanks.sectP2: We are thrilled to have you here to participate in the selection of our next ambassador. Your vote matters, and we want to make the process as straightforward as possible. Below, you'll find all the information you need to know about the contestants and how to cast your vote.
Thanks.sectThanks: Thank you for being part of this exciting journey to choose our next ambassador. Your voice matters, and we appreciate your participation!
Thanks.voiceMat: Your voice matters, and we appreciate your participation!
Thanks.howToVoteP: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Magnam autem, a recusandae vero praesentium qui impedit doloremque molestias.
Thanks.FAQSubH1: Can I change my vote after submitting it?
Thanks.FAQP1: Unfortunately, once you've cast your vote, it cannot be changed. Make sure to choose your favorite before confirming!
Thanks.FAQP2: The contestant with the highest number of votes at the end of the voting period will be declared the winner.
Thanks.FAQP3: Yes, your vote is completely anonymous. We value your privacy.

Vote.title: Zgjidh votën
Vote.VoteUn:
Votoni të paarritshme 
 ju lutem provoni më vonë

Components.alertModalPar: Ju duhet të hyni në profilin tuaj në Instagram për të plotësuar votën tuaj
Components.Title: NJOFTIM
Components.anotherModalPara: Kjo llogari nuk mund të përdoret për të votuar n ju lutem përdorni një llogari tjetër instagram
